availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Nathaniel PSimer (Johnson County, Kentucky farmer and solider)

body.p: Johnson County, Kentucky farmer and solider. Kentucky native. Married to Susanah PSimer. Father of Celia PSimer, Nancy E. PSimer, John M. PSimer, Mary S. PSimer, and Martha I. PSimer. Farmer in Johnson County in 1850 and 1860. Captain in the 65th Regiment of Kentucky Militia in Johnson County in 1864.

bibl.p: Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Johnson County, p. 107A; Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Johnson County, p. 122.
